name: One Star Prison
description:
One Star Prison is a co-op action puzzle escape game where players teleport through different prisons in different eras in time. You play as a prisoner from each time period and must work together with your friend to help each other escape!

The players start off each level trapped within their respective cells and must utilize their surroundings to break free. These initial holding cells and the level ahead will gradually get more challenging as they progress through the game. The players must navigate the level and solve different puzzles and avoid various enemies while performing a series of cooperative tasks to escape together.

Team
  • Yue Bao                       - Environment artist/ VFX
  • Emilia Li                       - Prop artist/ UI
  • Alex Chesterman   - Character artist/ SFX/ VFX
  • Devon Gibson          - Character artist/ Animator/ VFX
  • Ashe Bosworth       - Texture artist/ Prop artist
  • Steven Tan                 - Gameplay/UI Programmer
  • Peter He                     - AI Programmer
